data.title: Official website
data.meta_description: Yerevan municipality official website - municipality staff.
data.text:
Was born on February 28 1989 in Yerevan.

In 2009 graduated from Russian-Armenian (Slavonic) University, faculty of Applied Mathematics (Bachelor’s degree), in 2011 – Master’s degree of the same faculty (Mathematical modeling in Economics), in 2014 studied at “Queen Mary” university in London and got the Master’s degree in finances.

In 2009-2013 worked as senior specialist of loan department at Armenian Development Bank.

In 2010-2011 worked as the founder and leader of “Irrigate” engaged in installation of irrigation systems and landscape design.

2014-2016 worked as digitations systems expert at “Shirak” technological company.

In 2014-2018 led “Cyber Vision” software company.

In 2016 was elected Board member of the “Civil Contract” party.

In 2017-2018 was a member of Yerevan Council of Elders representing “Yelk” faction.

In 2018-2021 worked as Deputy Prime Minister of the Republic of Armenia.

In 2019 was elected a member of the “Civil Contract” party.

Since 2019 has been Board member of “Armenian National Interests Fund” CJSC.

In 2020-2021 worked as the RA Commandant during the State of Emergency announced as a result of COVID-19 pandemic.

Since 2021 has been the Chairman of the Board of Trustees of Armenia Renewable Resources and Energy Efficiency Fund (R2E2).

Since 2022 has been Board member of “ArmBusinessBank” CJSC.

Since 2022 has been the Chairman of the Board of Trustees of Armenian National Polytechnic University.

On September 23 2022 was appointed Deputy Mayor of Yerevan by the decision of the Council of Elders.

Was elected Yerevan Mayor at the meeting of Yerevan Council of Elders held on October 10, 2023.

Founder member of the “Civil Contract” party (2014).

Was awarded with the RA Ministry of defense diploma (2016).

Is married, has three daughters.

Was born on November 26, 1984 in Yerevan.

2001-2006- studied at Department of Law of Yerevan University of Hrachya Acharyan.

2002-2004 - served in the RA Armed Forces.

In 2017 was appointed head of Department of Problem Assets Management at “Anelik” bank.

On June 6, 2018, by the Decree of the RA Prime Minister was appointed first Deputy Minister of Transport, Communication, and IT.

On December 9, 2018 was elected member of National Assembly representing “My Step” alliance at the elections held on December 9.

On September 17, 2020, handed over his mandate of the NA member.

On September 25, 2020 was appointed Deputy Minister of Emergency Situations. On December 28 of the same year was appointed the First Deputy of the RA Minister of Emergency Situations.

On April 12,2022, was appointed the RA Minister of ES.

At the 6th congress of the “Civil Contract” party held on October 25, 2022, was elected Board member of the “Civil Contract” party.

On June 30, 2023, was dissolved from the office of the RA Ministry of EM because of the ministry’s dissolution.

During the elections for the Council of Elders held on September 17, 2023, headed the pre-election headquarters of the “Civil Contract” party.

As a result of the elections for Yerevan Council of Elders held on September 17, 2023, was elected member of Yerevan Council of Elders by the party-list proportional representation of the “Civil Contract” party.

At the meeting of the Council of Elders held on October 10, 2023, was appointed First Deputy Mayor of Yerevan.

Married, has two children.

Was born on March 19, 1988 in Yerevan:

In 2005 left the secondary school N116 in Moscow.

In 2005-2009 studied at Armenian-Russian (Slavonic) University, Department of Applied Mathematics and Informatics and graduated with Bachelor degree.

2008-2009 - Was vice president of the Student’s Council of Russian-Armenian (Slavonic) University (RAU).

2009-2011 – studied Master’s program at the Department of Economics and Finances of RAU.

2009-2011 worked at “Armenian Development Bank” as a specialist of financial market transaction specialist.

2011-2012 worked as a leading specialist of financial market transactions at “Armenian Development Bank”.

2014-2016 worked at “Ardshinbank” CJSC as a leading specialist of Treasury at the department of financial market transactions.

2016-2017 worked at “Ardshinbank” CJSC as the chief specialist of Treasury at the department of financial market transactions.

2017-2018 worked at “VTB Armenia Bank” as the chief specialist of Treasury at the department of financial market transactions.

Since 2018 up today has been working at “VTB Armenia Bank” CJSC as the Treasury analyst of the bank’s liquidity and currency positions management department.

On September 23, 2018, as a result of the snap elections of Yerevan Council of Elders was chosen member of the Council representing “My Step” faction.

From October 2018 till March 2019 was the vice chair of standing commission for financial-loan and economic issues of the Council of Elders of Yerevan.

Since March 2019 up today has been the chair of standing commission for financial-loan and economic issues of the Council of Elders of Yerevan.

Since November 2019 up today has been the Project Manager of the joint program of the USAID Management Systems and International and the RA Deputy Prime Minister’s Office.

On December 28 2021, at the meeting of the Council of Elders was assigned on the position of the First Deputy Mayor of Yerevan.

As a result of the elections for Yerevan Council of Elders held on September 17, 2023, was elected member of Yerevan Council of Elders by the party-list proportional representation of the "Civil Contract" party.

At the meeting of the Council of Elders held on October 10, 2023, was appointed Deputy Mayor of Yerevan.

Qualifications

In 2011 received the certificate for working as a leader of division responsible for providing investment services to leaders of executive body and members, deputy executive manager, banks and loan organizations of Investment Company and Foreign Investment Company Branch, by the Central Bank of the Republic of Armenia.

In 2012, as the group leader got the 3rd prize in “Microsoft Imagine Cup Armenia” contest,

In 2016, got a dealer’s qualification from the ACI – The Financial Markets Association (Paris, France) (Foreign Exchange, Fixed Income, Money Markets Derivatives, Repos, Asset Liability and Risk Management):

In 2017 received the certificate for keeping the register of securities and shares and depository from the Depository of the RA Central Bank.

In 2019, got the certificate of a participant of Challenges for Emerging Economy II summer school organized by the National Research University High School of Economics (Russian Federation) and Luxemburg University.

Married, has a son.

Was born on June 24, 1992.

In 2009-2013 studied at the Department of Law of Russian-Armenian University and graduated with Bachelor’s degree.

In 2013-2015 studied at the same Department of RAU and got his Master’s degree.

In 2015-2018 studied at RAU to get his Postgraduate degree.

In 2014 worked as an assistant to the legal consultant at “AM” law firm.

In 2014-2016 was the legal consultant at “AM” law firm.

In 2016-2017 worked as the senior consultant at “AM” law firm.

In 2017-2018 worked at “Concern Dialog” law firm as a lawyer.

2018-2019 worked at “Concern Dialog” law firm as a senior lawyer.

In 2019-2021 was the RA National Assembly delegate representing “My Step” faction, a member of the standing commission for the State-legal issues.

From April 2021 to December 2021 was Deputy Minister of Justice.

Since 2015 has been a member of the Chamber of Advocates of the Republic of Armenia.

Since 2018 has been a member of the “Civil Contract” party.

On February 8, 2022 was assigned Deputy Mayor of Yerevan.

As a result of the elections for Yerevan Council of Elders held on September 17, 2023, was elected member of Yerevan Council of Elders by the party-list proportional representation of the "Civil Contract" party.

At the meeting of the Council of Elders held on October 10, 2023, was appointed Deputy Mayor of Yerevan.

Married.

Was born on January 27, 1979 in Yerevan.

1985-1995 – studied at Yerevan school N68.

1995-1999 – studied at YSU Faculty of Law, graduated with Bachelor’s degree.

1999-2001 – was conscripted to Artsakh Armed Forces, then served in the RA Armed Forces.

2001-2002 – worked as a legal consultant at “Arbang” LLC.

2002-2004 – worked as a 1st category specialist at civil-economic legislation division of the RA National Assembly Legal Department.

2004-2006 – worked as a 1st category specialist of the legal service of the RA National Assembly Legislation Analysis and Development Department.

2005 – was awarded with the degree of the 1st class junior civil servant of the RA State Service.

2008-2009- was elected member of Council of Elders of Erebuni district of Yerevan.

2009-2014 – worked as a chief specialist at the division of normative-legal acts development and legal expertise of Yerevan Municipality Department of Law.

2010 – was awarded with the degree of the 2-nd category leading servant of the RA Community Service.

2015-2015 – worked as an advisor to the RA Minister of Urban Development.

2015-2016 – worked as a consultant at the RA Urban Development Ministry Law Department.

27.06.2016-2016 – worked as a consultant at the Department of Housing Policy and Communal Infrastructures of the RA Ministry of Urban Development.

2016-2023 – was the director of “Design Shin” LLC.

As a result of the elections for Yerevan Council of Elders held on September 17, 2023, was elected member of Yerevan Council of Elders by the party-list proportional representation of the “Republic” party.

At the meeting of the Council of Elders held on October 10, 2023, was appointed Deputy Mayor of Yerevan.

Is married, has two children.

Was born on September 26, 1976 in Yerevan.

In 1993 finished Yerevan secondary school N30 after Chkalov.

In 1993-2000 studied at Yerevan Institute of People’s Economics.

1995-1997 served in the RA Armed Forces.

2000-2001 worked at the SCJSC “Armenian airlines”.

In 2002 was elected, in 2005 and 2008 re-elected member of the Council of Elders of Kentron administrative district of Yerevan.

2004-2006 post-graduated at Yerevan institute of management and Economic Reforms.

2003-2007 was a member of Youth Parliament of the RA National Assembly.

2009-2011 was the head of social and economical development of Yerevan Municipality.

In 2012-2024 held the position of the head of Yerevan Municipality Department of Finance and chief financier.

In May 2024 was appointed acting deputy of Staff Secretary of Yerevan Municipality.

Is married, has two children.

Was born in 1957, on November 20, in Nerkin Sasnashen village of Aragatsotn marz.

In 1979 graduated from National Economy Institute of Yerevan.

1979-80 - worked in Economical Institute of the RA NAS as an economist.

1980-82 - served in the Soviet Army.

1982-95 worked in Economical Institute of the RA NAS as a scientist.

1995-99 - a deputy of the National Assembly. Till 1997 permanently worked in the standing commission of the RA NA Defense, State Security and Internal Affairs issues.

1997-2001 - a deputy mayor,12.1998. - 05.1998 was an acting mayor.

2001 - 2002 - the Deputy Minister of the RA Territorial Administration

2002-2003 - the Deputy Minister coordinating the activity of the RA territorial management substructures.

2003-2009 - the first Deputy Mayor of Yerevan.

On July 6 of 2009 on the decision of the Council of Elders of Yerevan was assigned Deputy Mayor of Yerevan.

According to the results of the elections for the Council of Elders held on May 5 2013, by the list of the Republican Party of Armenia was elected member of Yerevan Council of Elders.

On June 15, 2013 by the decision of the Council of Elders of Yerevan was appointed First Deputy Mayor of Yerevan.

In accordance with the results of the elections for the Council of Elders held in May 14, 2017 was elected member of the Council from the Republican Party of Armenia.

On June 16,2017, at the session of the Council of Elders was appointed the First Deputy Mayor of Yerevan.

In November 2018 was appointed Advisor to Yerevan Mayor.

1989-1992- in the staff of “Sasuntsiner” volunteers unit participated in the defence of the RA border.

Since 1990 has been the chairman of “Sasun-Taron” patriotic union NGO.

Since 2014 has been member of Yerkrapah Volunteer Union department.

Has been awarded with the 2nd grade medal “For services rendered to homeland”, with “Anania Shirakatsi” medal, with the honorary medal of the National Assembly of the republic of Armenia, with the medal of the RA Prime Minister, with “Yerevan emblem” and “Frityof Nansen” medals, with “Sparapet Vazgen Sargsyan” order, with “Yerkrapah Volunteer union-20” jubilee medal, with “Cooperation for Saving” medal.

Is a member of the Republican Party of Armenia.

Married, has two children.

Annex N2

Functions confirmed by the decision of Yerevan Mayor

N-1704-А dated June 4, 2015

Aims, tasks and functions of the department

7. The aim of the department is to ensure implementation of the powers entrusted to Yerevan Mayor in the sphere of health.

8. The tasks and functions of the department emerge from the powers given to Yerevan Mayor by legal acts in the sphere of health and are intended for their implementation.

9.

1) To provide implementation of state health programs by municipal medical establishments.

2) To manage the activity of municipal medical establishments.

3) To analyze the activity of municipal medical establishments.

4) To work out proposals:

а. for reorganization or dismissal of medical establishments subordinated to Yerevan Municipality

b. related to financing anticipated by Yerevan budget and to control its targeted use by municipal medical establishments.

5) To analyze the proposals related to the construction, reconstruction of municipal medical establishment and if necessary submit corresponding proposals to the Mayor.

6) To take measures for improvement of the quality and availability of medical aid in municipal medical establishments.

7) To control the order of providing free medical aid to citizens and if necessary to submit proposals to the Mayor so as to eliminate defects.

8) In accordance with the order determined by law, to participate in the organization of sanitary and anti-epidemical (preventive) and quarantine actions.

9) In accordance with determined order, to submit proposals on appointment and dismissal of the heads of municipal medical establishments.

10) To submit proposals on the application of incentives or disciplinary sanctions in relation to the directors of municipal medical establishments.

11) To draw up and submit to the Staff Secretary the annual and quarterly report on the results of the activity of the department.

Was born on January 20, 1971 in Yerevan.

1987-88 - worked as a worker in "Dzoraghbyur" producers' co-operative.

1988-93 - studied at Yerevan Institute of National Economy.

1991-93 - worked as an expert in "Hydro-1" producers' co-operative.

1993 - worked as a dispatcher engineer at the Ministry of Material Resources of the RA.

1993-94 - served in the RA Armed Forces.

1995-96 - worked at the Ministry of Material Resources of the RA first as an engineer, then as a referent.

1996 - started working at the RA Ministry of Trade, Service and Tourism first as a chief specialist, then as a chief of a division.

1997-2000 - worked at the Ministry of Industry and Trade as an acting chief of the department, a chief of the division, a head of the department.

2000-2002 - worked at the same ministry as the head of Export Department.

2002-2003 -worked at the Ministry of Industry as the Chairman of the Board of "Information and marketing centre" CSJC.

Since 2003 has been the head of Foreign Relations Department of the City Hall staff of Yerevan.

Is married, has two children.

The Department of Foreign Relations has two divisions: the division of foreign relations and the division of protocol. The Department shall

• prepare relevant decisions and orders on the instruction of the mayor;

• ensure establishment and development of friendly relations with foreign cities;

• promote trade and economic, scientific and technical, and cultural cooperation and relevant measures of the City Hall with foreign countries and cities, and international organizations;

• together with the corresponding services of the City Hall, prepare cooperation agreements with foreign cities, as well as with separate organizations and enterprises, and monitor their implementation;

• carry out the protocol of meetings and measures with the participation of the Mayor of Yerevan, deputy mayors and other officials;

• carry out the protocol measures related to the officials of foreign delegations and states;

• arrange the receptions the members of foreign delegations, groups, individuals arriving in Yerevan by the invitation of the Mayor of Yerevan;

• perform ceremonial procedures related to foreign delegations and officials of foreign states;

• arrange foreign business trips for delegations of the City Hall and employees of the system etc.

The head of the Department is David Gevorgyan.

Was born in 1974 in Yerevan.

1981-1991 studied at school N 152.

1992-1997 studied at YSU faculty of Mechanics, graduated as a mechanic, mathematician, teacher.

2007-2009 studied at “Eurasia” International University, got the Master’s Degree for Management.

2017- participated in “Social work” trainings, got the qualification of a social worker.

1990-1995 worked at “Hovik-2” cooperative.

1998-1999 worked in the system of the RA Ministries of Interior Affairs and the National Security.

1999-2003 worked as a chief specialist of Informatics division at “Yerevan Relay Factory” OJSC.

2007-worked as a leading specialist of the division for staff retraining and specialized studies of “National Institute of Labour and Social Research” SNCO of the RA Ministry of Labour and Social Affairs.

2016 –worked as a leading analyst specialist of the division for staff retraining and specialized studies of “National Institute of Labour and Social Research” SNCO of the RA Ministry of Labour and Social Affairs.

2018 –worked in the National Centre of SME Development as an expert of information, consulting and teaching support division.

2007-2018 worked as a coordinator, expert and person in charge in different international and state programs in the field of social defense; participated in relevant trainings.

2019- worked as deputy head of Social Welfare Department of the Municipality of Yerevan.

In February 2020 was appointed head of the Social Welfare Department of the Municipality of Yerevan.

Since 2009 up to present has been delivering lectures on “Management skills” provided for civil workers, community workers, social specialists.

Is married.

The department shall:

* work out and (or) prepare the drafts of legal and standard acts to be accepted by the Aldermen Council, the mayor and by other structures regarding Yerevan community, make conclusions on the projects of analogous legal acts;

* work out and (or) prepare the drafts of relevant agreements, documents, refers, make conclusions regarding the drafts of agreements, documents, refers submitted to the department;

* study legal problems regarding Yerevan community, local self-government and territorial government in Yerevan and suggest relevant solutions, as well as participate in the sessions of the Aldermen Council and in the work of corresponding commissions if necessary;

* submit to the mayor proposals on necessary functions’ implementation aimed at the implementation of the requirements of legal acts in the City Hall of Yerevan, as well as in separate subdivisions, in the organizations subordinated to the City Hall, and the requirements of the mayor and the Aldermen Council;

* submit the programs of the department to the mayor and to the staff secretary, in case of need prepare proposals, refers, reports, petitions and other documents within his authority;

* organize the discussion of applications and complaints of the citizens in the established order and submit the results;

* submit proposals to the mayor concerning goals and problems of the sector activity established by law, other legal acts, staff and department legislation;

* regularly inform the mayor about the department activity;

* implement the Aldermen Council decrees, the mayor’s decrees, orders, directions and assignments and inform about results the mayor and the staff secretary;

* collaborate with the state-governed bodies, local self-government and other bodies;

* if necessary, suggest the staff secretary to involve specialists, experts, representatives of scientific institutions in the department activity, as well as to form working groups;

* connected with the department functions, to the knowledge of the staff secretary, call conferences with the participation of corresponding authorities, specialists and experts;

* submit reports to the mayor on the work implemented by the corresponding bodies referring to the department services sector, and on the activity of the authority.

Was born in 1977 in Gyumri.

1994 - left the secondary school N9 in Gyumri.

2000 – graduated from department of history of historical-philological faculty of State Pedagogical Institute after M.Nalbandyan in Gyumri.

1999-2000 – in his final year at the institute started a job at the secondary school in Maisyan village of Shirak Marz as a history teacher.

2001 – started a job as a TV journalist at “Tsayg” TV company in Gyumri.

2001-2003 – worked at the news service department of “Shirak Public TV company”, then at the division of public programmes combining it with working as a history teacher at the secondary school of Keti village of Shirak marz.

2003 – worked as a correspondent of the “Armenia Public TV” in Shirak marz.

2003 – worked at news service of “Ar” TV company.

2003 – started working at news service of “Avetis” TV company.

2005 – worked at the creative programmes division at “Nor Aliq”, “Sigma” TV company.

2005 – worked at news service of “Shant” TV company.

2006 – worked at news service of “Armenia” TV company.

2006-2009 – worked at Yerevan Municipality Department of Information and Public Relations as a chief specialist.

2009 – worked at news programmes division of ‘Armnews” TV company.

2010 – worked at a news program of “Armenia” TV.

2011 – started a job at Yerevan Municipality Department of Information and Public Relations as a chief specialist.

2019 – was appointed deputy head of Yerevan Municipality Department of Information and Public Relations.

In January 2024 was appointed acting head of Yerevan Municipality Department Information.

2022 - By Yerevan Mayor’s decision N4575-A made on 23.12.2022., was awarded “Yerevan 2800” gold medal for efficient and devoted activity was awarded with “Yerevan 2800” memorial gold medal.

Is married, has two children.

Was born on May 4,1961 in Yerevan, in an employee family.

1968-went to Yerevan Russian school n 12 after S.M. Kirov and left it in 1978.

After leaving school worked at Auto-Aggregate plant mechanics department, from 1979 till 1981 worked at sewing production unit after K. Tsetkin.

1983-entered Russian Pedagogical College after N. Ostrovski, school department and graduated from it with honours in 1985.

1985-started working at party committee of Leninyan district.

In parallel with work got postal tuition at State Pedagogic University after Kh. Abovyan, department of history and graduated from it in 1992.

1994- started working at executive committee of Yerevan city council.

Afterwards started working as a first class specialist, head of inspection division of Education Department at Yerevan City Hall, then as a deputy head of department, head of general education division.

Since February 21, 2014 has been the head of Organization Department of Yerevan Municipality.

While working at Yerevan City Hall was awarded with thanksgiving diplomas of the director of the National Institute of the RA Ministry of Education and Science, of the RA Minister of Sport and Youth Affairs, of the RA Government Foundation «One nation, one culture», in 2012 was awarded with the RA President's honorary diplomas.

Is married, has three children, three grandchildren.

Was born on January 1, 1983.

1989 entered Yerevan secondary school after S. Sahakyan.

1999-finished Yerevan college N2

1999-2004-entered and graduated from Armenian State Pedagogical University after Kh.Abovyan, Faculty of Culture, Department of “Directing of mass events” with the qualification of film director, teacher.

2004-2007-entered and post-graduated with honours the post-graduation course “Directing of mass events” of the Faculty of Culture of Armenian State Pedagogical University after Kh. Abovyan.

2007-got PhD in Pedagogical sciences.

2000 –founded the student theater-studio “Yerkir”.

2007-2013 –worked at Yerevan Municipality Department of Culture, Tourism and Youth Affairs as an assistant to the head of the Department and chief specialist.

Since 2007 has been teaching at the department of “Directing” of the Faculty of Culture of Armenian State Pedagogical University after Kh. Abovyan, led about 40 Master theses.

2013-was appointed assistant of Yerevan Deputy Mayor.

2010 founded student theatrical laboratory “Duet”.

2012- founded children and youth theatrical studio “Artist”.

In the period from 1999 to 2017 staged more than 60 performances (operas, musicals, dramas, children and youth and other performances).

Since 2018 has been a member of the Union of Theater Figures of Armenia.

Since 2000 has been taking part in a number of republican and international theatrical festivals, got awards. For the contribution to the drama art, for many years of devoted work has been awarded with honorary and thanksgiving diplomas.

Since 2000 has been a member of the Professional Boards of a number of international and republican theatrical festivals. (Jury)

Authored a number of scientific articles and methodical manuals published in specialized journals.

On January 18, 2016 got the title of the Associate Professor (ASPU Pedagogical Council)

In 2016, on the behest of the US Western Diocese of the Armenian Apostolic Church Archbishop Hovnan Terteryan was in the USA with the performances. At “Alex” theater of Glendale staged “Anoush” opera by A. Tigranyan; within the frames of the 100th anniversary of the Armenian Genocide presented “Liturgy by Komitas” concert-performance. Has been stage director and creative director of a number of projects.

In 2017, in New York cofounded the Armenian-American cultural organization “For the first time on the world stage”, which staged “Abegha” opera by Barsegh Kanachyan.

On February 23, 2018 was awarded with thanksgiving medal of Yerevan State College of Fine Arts after P. Terlemezyan for “Personal contribution to the development of the educational establishment”.

In January 2019 was appointed acting head of the Department of Culture of Yerevan Municipality.

In April 2019, by the Mayor’s decision was appointed head of the Department of Culture.
